## thetacli daemon start

Run the thatacli daemon

### Synopsis

Run the thatacli daemon.

```
thetacli daemon start [flags]
```

### Examples

```
thetacli daemon start --port=16889
```

```
  -h, --help          help for start
      --port string   Port to run the ThetaCli Daemon (default "16889")
```
